type
class
defined in
haxel.HxlTilemap

Constructor

public new(?X : Int, ?Y : Int, ?Rect : flash.geom.Rectangle)

Instance Variables

private _alpha : Float

private _color : Int

public _ct : flash.geom.ColorTransform

private _mtx : flash.geom.Matrix

public alpha(getAlpha,setAlpha) : Float

public bitmapRect : flash.geom.Rectangle

A Rectangle describing the location of this tiles graphic on the HxlTilemap bitmap.

public blend : String

Blending modes, just like Photoshop! E.g. "multiply", "screen", etc.

public color(getColor,setColor) : Int

public dataNum : Int

An Int representing the index of the graphic to use for this tile. If 0, tile has no graphic.

public mapX : Int

The coordinates of this tile within the HxlTilemap.

public mapY : Int

public visibility : Visibility

Instance Methods

public getAlpha() : Float

Set alpha to a number between 0 and 1 to change the opacity of this tile.

public getColor() : Int

Set color to a number in this format: 0xRRGGBB. color IGNORES ALPHA. To change the opacity use alpha. Tints the whole sprite to be this color (similar to OpenGL vertex colors).

public isBlockingMovement() : Bool

public isBlockingView() : Bool

public setAlpha(Alpha : Float) : Float

public setColor(Color : Int) : Int
